ygData.subject: Re: [RE: [eqbards] ugh, shutting bards out of lotto getting more wides  pread   ]
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, first of all this makes me glad I am not in an UberGuild (which of course means our guild won t be taking on dragons anytime soon). Secondly I *love* a
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, first of all this makes me glad I am not in an UberGuild (which of
course means our guild won't be taking on dragons anytime soon). Secondly I
*love* a good active reply like a clearly stated class boycott. Less whiney
than a petition, more mature than screaming, more likely to change the
status quo than quitting. Keep a positive, mature attitude and a steel
resolve and a lot can happen. I hope it goes well for you.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, Vacationing Virtual Community Agent Provocateur
